ng duration blast could make the tunnel stable and large enough an army cou=
ld follow.

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Megatron X strode to the hole and sneered down into it.  Why did Cybertronians stoop to adopting such organic forms?  It was degrading.  He brought his fusion cannon online and aimed down the hole.  A strong enough long duration blast could make the tunnel stable and large enough an army could follow.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>"Well then, we'll just flush them out.  I will not dignify these cowards by going under the ground to get them!"<BR><BR>--- On <B>Thu, 9/25/08, xochitla2006 <I><xochitla2006@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>

" Legacy spoke, his words cold and clipped. <BR>> <BR>> Legacy's gaze swept along megatron's form trying to isolate an <BR>errant sensor blip even as he continued speaking. "ALSO IT IS <BR>UNLIKELY HE WILL ANSWER YOU, AS AT LAST SCAN HE WAS HEAVILLY DAMAGED <BR>AND UNCONSCIOUS, BEING CARRIED  AT THE TIME BY A PREDACON BENEATH THE <BR>GROUND."<BR>> <BR>> Legacy gestured to an apparently freshly made hole just large <BR>enough for a single being at a time to venture inside and from the <BR>looks of it, it could easily collapse. <BR>> <BR>> (TAG: Megatron X, Kup, Grimlock)<BR>> <BR>> Preston<BR>><BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
